protocol.text: The data was analyzed using GenespringGX 7.3.1. The raw CEL files were pre-processed using the RMA algorithm and the resulting expression values were normalized per chip to the median across all chips. ID_REF =  VALUE = Signal ABS_CALL = indicating whether the transcript was present (P), absent (A), or marginal (M) DETECTION P-VALUE =

Treatment involved lifting plants and rinsing off soil, placing roots in a spore suspension (1x106 spores/ml) for 1 minute, replanting, and covering tray with a clear plastic dome to maintain humidity. Plants were transferred to long day conditions (16hrs light) at 28C. Samples were harvested after 4 days post inoculation.
Plants were grown under short day conditions (8hrs light, 24C and 21C day night cycle) in plastic trays (20 cells) with one plant per cell for 4 weeks before treatment.
Total RNA was extracted using the RNeasy Plant Mini Kit (Qiagen) according to the manfacturer's instructions.
